plot: Every every day is the snapshot of four men who are victims of routine. In six minutes, a hot dog vendor, a painter, a lumberjack and a man in his bathtub experience the small comic tragedy of that instant.
title: Todos todos los días
plot_es: Every every day is the snapshot of four men who are victims of routine. In six minutes, a hot dog vendor, a painter, a lumberjack and a man in his bathtub experience the small comic tragedy of that instant.
plot_en: Every every day is the snapshot of four men who are victims of routine. In six minutes, a hot dog vendor, a painter, a lumberjack and a man in his bathtub experience the small comic tragedy of that instant.
